origin.description: The namespace and ID of the origin the entity needs to have to pass the check.
origin.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the origin the entity needs to have to pass the check.

layer.description: If specified, the condition will check if the origin is from the specified origin layer.
layer.markdownDescription: If specified, the condition will check if the origin is from the specified origin layer.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/origin)

Checks whether the entity has a certain origin (optionally from a certain layer).

Type ID: `origins:origin`


!!! note

    This condition will evaluate to false if the entity is not a player.
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/origin)

Checks whether the entity has a certain origin (optionally from a certain layer).

Type ID: `origins:origin`


!!! note

    This condition will evaluate to false if the entity is not a player.
